rows.label: qst104902_msg0001
rows.name: Ohh, that face! Such eminent beauty!

rows.label: qst104902_msg0002
rows.name:
I would like you to pick
some of the elegant ice
flowers that bloom near here.

rows.label: qst104902_msg0003
rows.name:
Just picturing your dazzling form
picking those gorgeous flowers...
Ohh, fetch the smelling salts...

rows.label: qst104902_msg0101
rows.name:
So you choose not to grace me with
your beguiling companions? I see...

rows.label: qst104902_msg0102
rows.name:
Well, I'd like you to pick some
ice flowers that bloom near here.

rows.label: qst104902_msg0103
rows.name:
Don't bother me. I'm picturing
the moment where smoldering
beauty meets ice-cold flowers...
